alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Jerauld (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:27AM MDT until June 24 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR WESTERN BEADLE AND NORTHWESTERN JERAULD COUNTIES... At 226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Virgil, or 19 miles southwest of Huron, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wolsey and Virgil around 240 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Broadland and Wessington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
